effect.scarlet-violet: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).
effect.the-teal-mask: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).
effect.the-indigo-disk: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).

short_effect.scarlet-violet: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon’s moves for four turns.
short_effect.the-teal-mask: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon’s moves for four turns.
short_effect.the-indigo-disk: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon’s moves for four turns.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass counterpart, this move's power is boosted and a vast sea of fire appears.
